MonsterTrait.Name: Trampling Charge
MonsterTrait.Text: If the ngobou moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the ngobou can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

MonsterTrait.Name: Elephants' Bane
MonsterTrait.Text: The ngobou has advantage on attacks against elephants. It can detect by scent whether an elephant has been within 180 feet of its location anytime in the last 48 hours.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spikes
MonsterTrait.Text: A creature that grapples an ngobou takes 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Gore
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 38 (6d10 + 5) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Stomp
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
